title: Blackstone, Canada Pension Plan in $1.2 Billion Joint Venture With FDIC
description: Two units of Blackstone Real Estate Debt Strategies, Blackstone Real Estate Income Trust, Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and funds affiliated with Rialto Capital entered a newly formed joint venture with the FDIC.
